__e: Oh, the thinks I had lied to him and will never speak to me again.
I have none for you anymore, you who lied and hid him for all those years.
He tricked her and he left her. He's dead.
There must be a good reason you've lied.
You know, I haven't even started looking for her yet, because you lied to me.
I think we started lying to each other almost as soon as we met, so there's no real reason to believe any of it was true.
It's not your fault that you lied to me over and over again.
THAT MY DREAM WAS YOUR DREAM. YEAH, I ONLY SAID THAT BECAUSE I KNEW WE COULDN'T DO IT
If you tell her now that you already lied it's all over.
No matter who she is, if she lied to you, man...
And you're mad that she lied to you, and I understand that, but you're alone, too, and you also need someone to talk to.
There's still one player in all this who hasn't lied to us.
I'm not sure that I haven't been lying this whole time.
All I'm saying is I didn't really tell the cops what happened, and I didn't want to go back without having spoken to you first.
I am so sorry that I lied to you-- that I didn't tell you the truth in the first place.
